snippet: General Manager Jerry Reese discussed the state of the Giants heading into the off-season, including the need to accommodate some new Super Bowl champions like Victor Cruz.
abstract: General Manager Jerry Reese discussed the state of the Giants heading into the off-season, including the need to accommodate some new Super Bowl champions like Victor Cruz.
lead_paragraph: Giants tight ends Jake Ballard and Travis Beckum are expected to start next season on the physically unable to perform list after tearing knee ligaments in the Super Bowl. Finding a replacement or two will be one task for Giants General Manager Jerry Reese in the off-season.

headline.main: Victor Cruz Wants Raise; Jerry Reese Speaks
